title: Lapse of University of Hawaii appropriations
context: [§40-86] Lapse of University of Hawaii appropriations. Upon the lapse of an appropriation to the University of Hawaii, moneys which remain unencumbered shall be returned to the state treasury within ninety days. [L 1986, c 321, §2] Note Repeal of section by L 1986, c 321, §12 as amended by L 1987, c 283, §69; L 1989, c 371, §7; L 1991, c 163, §3; L 1993, c 314, §2; L Sp 1993, c 8, §22; L 1997, c 180, §1; L 1998, c 115, §24; and L 2005, c 137, §1 deleted by L 2006, c 161, §7.
